thread:
Researchers develop WEBDREAMER, an LLM-powered planning framework for web agents 🧠🌐 #AIResearch
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2411.06559

Researchers develop new AI framework that uses LLMs to simulate state transitions and score future outcomes, enabling agents to make informed decisions without real-world testing 🤖 #AI #MachineLearning
This year’s #AIIndex2025 highlights a new world model, Dreamer-7B. 🧠🤖 #AIResearch
Research team develops AI model using 1 million synthetic interactions, surpassing top models on key benchmarks 🔬📈 #AIAdvances #TechInnovation
Experimental results show WEBDREAMER surpasses reactive baselines and tree search methods in efficiency and effectiveness, especially on real-world websites 🚀 #AIAdvances
